DOC.brief_summary: This interventional, randomized controlled study tests the effects of a a brief psychological intervention (Narrative Exposure Therapy) against a wait list control group among refugees who have experienced trauma and have some symptoms of PTSD.
DOC.brief_title: Stress Reduction in Middle Eastern Refugees
DOC.criteria: Refugees from the Middle East, and possible from Africa, who have experienced conflictrelated trauma, have symptoms of PTSD, and speak either Arabic or English Currently received exposure therapy for PTSD Planning to leave area in next 4 months
